web.secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired.en: Must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol
web.secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired.translation: Mora vključevati velike in male črke, številko in simbol

web.secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youv.en: They'll appear here once you've shared them.
web.secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youv.translation: Pojavile se bodo tukaj, ko jih boste delili.

web.secrets.workspace_mode_description.en: Create multiple secrets without leaving this page

web.secrets.sample_secret_content_this_c.en: Sample secret content This could be sensitive data Or a multi-line message
web.secrets.sample_secret_content_this_c.translation: Vzorčna vsebina skrivnosti. To bi lahko bili občutljivi podatki ali večvrstično sporočilo

web.secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_ta.en: You can close this window when done.
web.secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_ta.translation: To okno lahko zaprete, ko končate.

web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_.en: Enter the secret content to share here
web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_.translation: Tukaj vnesite vsebino skrivnosti za deljenje

web.secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_se.en: When ready, click the button at the top of the page to reveal your one-time message.
web.secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_se.translation: Ko ste pripravljeni, kliknite gumb na vrhu strani za razkritje svojega enkratnega sporočila.

web.secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret.en: Yes. After viewing, the secret is permanently deleted from our servers, ensuring your privacy.
web.secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret.translation: Da. Po ogledu je skrivnost trajno izbrisana z naših strežnikov, kar zagotavlja vašo zasebnost.

web.secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_w.en: Onetime Secret is a secure way to share sensitive information that self-destructs after a single viewing.
web.secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_w.translation: Onetime Secret je varen način deljenja občutljivih informacij, ki se samouniči po enkratnem ogledu.

web.secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_wha.en: Before you open it, here's what you should know:
web.secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_wha.translation: Preden jo odprete, to morate vedeti:

web.secrets.a_secure_one_time_message_aw.en: A secure, one-time message awaits you.

web.secrets.that_information_is_no_longe.en: This secret has been viewed or expired.
web.secrets.that_information_is_no_longe.translation: Ta skrivnost je bila ogledana ali je potekla.

web.private.this_msg_is_encrypted.en: This message is encrypted with your passphrase.
web.private.this_msg_is_encrypted.translation: To sporočilo je šifrirano z vašo pristopno frazo.

web.private.only_see_once.en: Careful: you will only see this once.
web.private.only_see_once.translation: Pozor: videli boste to samo enkrat.

web.private.created_securely.en: Your secret has been created securely
web.private.created_securely.translation: Vaša skrivnost je bila varno ustvarjena

web.private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_pe.en: The burn feature lets you permanently delete a secret before anyone views it. This is useful if you need to revoke access or shared the wrong information. Once burned, the secret cannot be recovered.
web.private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_pe.translation: Funkcija trajnega brisanja vam omogoča trajno brisanje skrivnosti, preden jo kdo ogleda. To je uporabno, če morate preklicati dostop ali ste delili napačne informacije. Ko je izbrisana, skrivnosti ni mogoče obnoviti.

web.private.your_secret_will_remain_avai.en: Your secret will remain available for {0} or until it's viewed, whichever comes first. After either condition is met, the secret is permanently deleted.
web.private.your_secret_will_remain_avai.translation: Vaša skrivnost bo na voljo {0} ali dokler ni ogledana, kar koli se zgodi prej. Po izpolnitvi katerega koli pogoja bo skrivnost trajno izbrisana.

web.private.for_security_reasons_we_cant.en: For security reasons, we can't recover lost secret links. You'll need to create a new secret and generate a new link. We recommend copying the link immediately after creation.
web.private.for_security_reasons_we_cant.translation: Zaradi varnostnih razlogov ne moremo obnoviti izgubljenih skrivnih povezav. Ustvariti boste morali novo skrivnost in generirati novo povezavo. Priporočamo, da povezavo kopirate takoj po ustvaritvi.

web.private.we_display_the_value_for_you.en: We display the value for you so that you can verify it but we do that once so that if someone gets this private page (in your browser history or if you accidentally send the private link instead of the secret one), they won't see the secret value.
web.private.we_display_the_value_for_you.translation: Prikazujemo vrednost za vas, da jo lahko preverite, vendar to naredimo samo enkrat, da če nekdo dobi to zasebno stran (v zgodovini vašega brskalnika ali če po nesreči pošljete zasebno povezavo namesto skrivne), ne bodo videli skrivne vrednosti.

web.private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secre.en: Why can I only see the secret value once?
web.private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secre.translation: Zakaj lahko vidim skrivno vrednost samo enkrat?

web.private.burning_a_secret_permanently.en: Burning a secret permanently deletes it before anyone can read it. The recipient will see a message indicating the secret doesn't exist. This is useful if you accidentally share the wrong information or need to prevent access.
web.private.burning_a_secret_permanently.translation: Trajno brisanje skrivnosti jo trajno izbriše, preden jo lahko kdorkoli prebere. Prejemnik bo videl sporočilo, ki nakazuje, da skrivnost ne obstaja. To je uporabno, če po nesreči delite napačne informacije ali morate preprečiti dostop.

web.private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_s.en: What happens when I burn a secret?
web.private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_s.translation: Kaj se zgodi, ko trajno izbrišem skrivnost?

web.private.and_never_stored_in_its_orig.en: and never stored in its original form. This approach means we can't access or recover your secret - only someone with the correct passphrase can.
web.private.and_never_stored_in_its_orig.translation: in nikoli shranjena v svoji izvirni obliki. Ta pristop pomeni, da ne moremo dostopati ali obnoviti vaše skrivnosti - samo nekdo s pravilno pristopno frazo lahko.

web.private.each_secret_can_only_be_view.en: Each secret can only be viewed once. After viewing, it's permanently deleted from our servers. This ensures your sensitive information isn't accidentally exposed through browser history or mistakenly shared private links.
web.private.each_secret_can_only_be_view.translation: Vsako skrivnost je mogoče ogledati samo enkrat. Po ogledu je trajno izbrisana z naših strežnikov. To zagotavlja, da vaše občutljive informacije niso pomotoma izpostavljene preko zgodovine brskalnika ali napačno deljenih zasebnih povezav.

web.shared.viewed_own_secret.en: You have viewed your own secret. It is no longer available for anyone else.
web.shared.viewed_own_secret.translation: Ogledali ste svojo lastno skrivnost. Nikomur drugemu ni več na voljo.

web.shared.you_created_this_secret.en: You created this secret. If you view it, the recipient will not be able to see it.
web.shared.you_created_this_secret.translation: To skrivnost ste ustvarili vi. Če jo ogledate, je prejemnik ne bo mogel videti.

web.shared.pre_reveal_default.en: Click the button below to reveal your secure message.
web.shared.pre_reveal_default.translation: Kliknite spodnji gumb za razkritje svojega varnega sporočila.

web.shared.post_reveal_default.en: Your secure message is shown below.
web.shared.post_reveal_default.translation: Vaše varno sporočilo je prikazano spodaj.
